title: Handle Competitive Port-in Request
description: A new customer wants to switch from another carrier and keep their existing phone number.

tasks.description: Collect the necessary information for the port-in request (old account number, PIN, phone number).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly gathers all required details from the customer.

tasks.description: Submit the port-in request to the national number portability database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the porting request using the system tool.

tasks.description: Check the status of the port-in request and inform the customer of the expected completion time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent queries the system and informs the customer the port will complete in 1-2 hours.
